Package server.handler

package server.handler
A package containing classes to handle HTTP requests and responses
Version:
1.0 - June 8th 2023
Author:
Harry Xu
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    server
    A package containing classes relating to the web server
    server.handler.methods
    A package containing interfaces corresponding to HTTP request method
    server.handler.routes
    A package containing classes to handle requests to certain HTTP endpoints
    server.request
    A package containing classes related to HTTP requests
    server.response
    A package containing classes related to HTTP responses
  • Class
    Description
    Handler
    The superclass for all route handlers in a web application.
    HandlerException
    This exception should be thrown if there is no handler that handle a request
    Handlers
    Maps URL patterns to different Handlers and allows them to be dispatched correctly.
    NotFoundException
    Thrown to manually indicates to the server to show a 404 page.
    URL
    Represents a URL pattern which can be used to match against URLs.
